text: Little Shop of Horrors is an American rock musical comedy horror movie. It is directed by Frank Oz and was released in December 19, 1986. This movie is about a geeky florist shop worker who finds out his Venus flytrap can speak. This movie was nominated for two Academy Awards, one for Best Visual Effects and another for Best Original Song. == References == ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1986 comedy movies Category:1986 horror movies Category:1986 musical movies Category:English-language movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:American horror movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Frank Oz
title: Little Shop of Horrors
